talents.info_text: Summons 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 void shards. The void shards come into being destabilized and will suffer 26, 35, 42, 48, 53 temporal damage each turn for five turns. If they die while destabilized they'll explode for 55, 74, 88, 101, 111 temporal and 55, 74, 88, 101, 111 physical damage in a radius of 4.
